resources.string: Your Profile Details are listed below:
This notification confirms that the order is placed
You do not have any favorite restaurants
You haven\'t placed any orders yet

A.1 You will be taught using pre-recorded videos and text tutorials. The training has quizzes, assignments, and tests to help you learn better. At the end of the training, you will attempt a project to get hands-on practice of what you learn during your training.

A.2 As this is a purely online training program, you can choose to learn at any time of the day. We will recommend a pace to be followed throughout the program, but the actual timings and learning hours can be decided by students according to their convenience.
A.4 We recommend spending 10-12 hours per week. However, the actual learning hours can be decided by you as per your convenience.
A.3 The training duration is of 6 weeks.
A.5 You can choose your preferred batch date while signing up for the training program.
A.6 You will be able to download the certificate once you complete your training and take the final test.

resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Your order has been successfully placed!
Your previous orders are listed below :
Q.5 How can I be sure that my information in this app is safe?
Q.1 How does this app work?
A.1 This app fetches out the nearby restaurants and their menu using device location and displays to the user. The user needs to select the restraunts and order food from the menu.
Q.2 How to pay the bills?
A.2 Bills can be paid either online depending on your choice. In onilne payment, payment can be done through your debit/credit card, Paytm, GooglePay etc.
Q.3 What is the duration of delivering the order?
A.3 Maximum duration for delivery is 45 minutes.
Q.4 What if food is not delivered on time?
A.4 If the food is not delivered in time, you will be refunded. Although it depends how much far the restraunt is
Your information is secured inside your device itself as it uses device database to store the data.
Q.6 Does this app really helps in ordering food online?
This is just a demo app and does not really work for ordering food.
